ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Those who have taqwa will be amid Gardens and Springs:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Verily those who keep away from evil and follow the straight path shall be in the midst of gardens and springs of water.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: As for the God-fearing, they shall be amid gardens and springs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The pious will live in gardens with streams
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed the pious are amidst Gardens and springs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Truly, those who have Taqwa, will dwell in Gardens and water springs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely those who guard (against evil) shall be in the midst of gardens and fountains:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: But the godfearing shall be amidst gardens and fountains:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! those who ward off (evil) are among gardens and watersprings.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Truly, the God-fearing shall dwell amid gardens and fountains --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily the God-fearing shall be amidst gardens and springs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed the Godwary will be amid gardens and springs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: The righteous (will be) amid gardens and fountains (of clear-flowing water).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Truly! The Muttaqun (pious and righteous persons - see V. 2:2) will be amidst Gardens and water-springs (Paradise).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: But the cautious shall live amongst gardens and fountains:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: But the righteous will be in gardens with springs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, the righteous will be within gardens and springs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [15:45] Truly the God-fearing shall be amidst gardens, orchards, and springs’, flowing through them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! those who ward off (evil)) disbelief, idolatry, and indecencies, i.e. Abu Bakr, 'Umar and their fellow believers (are among Gardens and water springs) springs of pure water.
